title: Level 2 EDI electric field - Hans Vaith (UNH)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/mms/mms1/edi/brst/l2/efield/2015/09/mms1_edi_brst_l2_efield_20150914141304_v1.5.0.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 38.8889% of the 14 timesteps. Cadence = 5000000000 [ns] = PT5S.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: TT2000 time tags velocity and electric field data.

parameters.name: mms1_edi_vdrift_dsl_brst_l2
parameters.description: ExB drift velocity in DSL coordinates.

parameters.name: mms1_edi_vdrift_dsl_brst_l2_noerr
parameters.description: ---> ExB drift velocity in DSL coordinates (no error bars). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['mms1_edi_vdrift_dsl_brst_l2']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
